get_added[source]

get_added(df_old, df_new, unique_id, trans_col='transaction', trans_vaL='added')

Returns the added rows in df_new

Parameters 

df_old : pd.DataFrame
    dataframe with previous information
df_new: pd.DataFrame
    dataframe with new information
unique_id: str or list
    unique identifier(s)
trans_col: str
    name of column to track transaction (default is "transaction")
trans_val: str
    name of value to reflect transaction status (default is "added")

Returns

pd.DataFrame dataframe that contains added rows

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
df_old = pd.DataFrame({
    "date":["2020-11-24", "2020-11-24","2020-11-24","2020-11-24"],
    "id":["001","002","003","004"],
    "quantity":[22,8,7,10],
    "color":["Yellow","Orange","Red","Yellow"],
})

df_new = pd.DataFrame({
    "date":["2020-11-24","2020-11-25","2020-11-24","2020-11-24", "2020-11-25" ],
    "id":["001","002", "004", "005", "001"],
    "quantity":[22,6,5,10,22],
    "color":["Yellow","Orange","Red","Pink", "Yellow"],
})
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
df_old
date id quantity color
0 2020-11-24 001 22 Yellow
1 2020-11-24 002 8 Orange
2 2020-11-24 003 7 Red
3 2020-11-24 004 10 Yellow
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
df_new
date id quantity color
0 2020-11-24 001 22 Yellow
1 2020-11-25 002 6 Orange
2 2020-11-24 004 5 Red
3 2020-11-24 005 10 Pink
4 2020-11-25 001 22 Yellow
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
added_rows = get_added(df_old=df_old, df_new=df_new, unique_id="id")
df_added = pd.DataFrame({"date":["2013-11-24"],"id":["005"],"quantity":[10],"color":["Pink"],"transaction":["added"]})
test_eq(added_rows, df_added)
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

get_removed[source]

get_removed(df_old, df_new, unique_id, trans_col='transaction', trans_val='removed')

Returns the removed rows that are not any longer in df_new

Parameters 

df_old : pd.DataFrame
    dataframe with previous information
df_new: pd.DataFrame
    dataframe with new information
unique_id: str or list
    unique identifier(s)
trans_col: str
    name of column to track transaction (default is "transaction")
trans_val: str
    name of value to reflect transaction status (default is "removed")

Returns

pd.DataFrame dataframe that contains removed rows

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
removed_rows = get_removed(df_old=df_old, df_new=df_new, unique_id="id")
df_removed = pd.DataFrame({"date":["2013-11-24"],"id":["003"],"quantity":[7],"color":["Red"],"transaction":["removed"]})
test_eq(removed_rows, df_removed)
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

get_modified[source]

get_modified(df_old, df_new, unique_id, added_rows=None, trans_col='transaction', trans_val='modified')

Returns the modified rows in df_new

Parameters 

df_old : pd.DataFrame
    dataframe with previous information
df_new: pd.DataFrame
    dataframe with new information
unique_id: str or list
    unique identifier(s)
added_rows: pd.DataFrame
    added rows from calling get_added function
trans_col: str
    name of column to track transaction (default is "transaction")
trans_val: str
    name of value to reflect transaction status (default is "modified")

Returns

pd.DataFrame dataframe that contains modified rows

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
modified_rows = get_modified(df_old=df_old, df_new=df_new, unique_id="id")

df_modified = pd.DataFrame({"date":["2013-11-25", "2013-11-24", "2013-11-24"],"id":["002", "004", "005"],"quantity":[6,5,10],"color":["Orange", "Red", "Pink"],"transaction":["modified", "modified", "modified"]})

test_eq(modified_rows, df_modified)
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
modified_rows = get_modified(df_old=df_old, df_new=df_new, unique_id="id", added_rows=added_rows)

df_modified = pd.DataFrame({"date":["2013-11-25", "2013-11-24"],"id":["002", "004"],"quantity":[6,5],"color":["Orange", "Red"],"transaction":["modified", "modified"]})

test_eq(modified_rows, df_modified)
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

get_delta[source]

get_delta(df_old, df_new, unique_id, sort_by=None, trans_col='transaction', trans_val_added='added', trans_val_removed='removed', trans_val_modified='modified')

Returns delta (added, removed, modified) betwen df_old and df_new

Parameters 

df_old : pd.DataFrame
    dataframe with previous information
df_new: pd.DataFrame
    dataframe with new information
unique_id: str or list
    unique identifier(s)
sort_by: str or list
    cols to sort result
added_rows: pd.DataFrame
    added rows from calling get_added function
trans_col: str
    name of column to track transaction (default is "transaction")
trans_val_added: str
    name of value to reflect transaction status (default is "added")
trans_val_removed: str
    name of value to reflect transaction status (default is "removed")
trans_val_modified: str
    name of value to reflect transaction status (default is "modified")

Returns

pd.DataFrame dataframe that contains delta between df_old and df_new

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

log_delta[source]

log_delta(df_log, df_old, df_new, unique_id, sort_by=None, trans_col='transaction', trans_val_added='added', trans_val_removed='removed', trans_val_modified='modified')

Returns logged delta (added, removed, modified) betwen df_old and df_new

Parameters 

df_log : pd.DataFrame
    dataframe with logged delta - if no log exists yet set df_log=None
df_old : pd.DataFrame
    dataframe with previous information
df_new: pd.DataFrame
    dataframe with new information
unique_id: str or list
    unique identifier(s)
sort_by: str or list
    cols to sort result
added_rows: pd.DataFrame
    added rows from calling get_added function
trans_col: str
    name of column to track transaction (default is "transaction")
trans_val_added: str
    name of value to reflect transaction status (default is "added")
trans_val_removed: str
    name of value to reflect transaction status (default is "removed")
trans_val_modified: str
    name of value to reflect transaction status (default is "modified")

Returns

pd.DataFrame dataframe that contains logged delta

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
df = get_delta(df_old=df_old, df_new=df_new, unique_id="id")
df
date id quantity color transaction
5 2020-11-24 005 10.0 Pink added
5 2020-11-24 003 7.0 Red removed
4 2020-11-25 002 6.0 Orange modified
5 2020-11-24 004 5.0 Red modified
6 2020-11-25 001 22.0 Yellow modified
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
df = get_delta(df_old=df_old, df_new=df_new, unique_id="id", sort_by=["date"])
df
date id quantity color transaction
5 2020-11-24 005 10.0 Pink added
5 2020-11-24 003 7.0 Red removed
5 2020-11-24 004 5.0 Red modified
4 2020-11-25 002 6.0 Orange modified
6 2020-11-25 001 22.0 Yellow modified
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
df_log = log_delta(df_log=None, df_old=df_old, df_new=df_new, unique_id="id")

logged_df = pd.DataFrame({"date":["2013-11-24", "2013-11-24", "2013-11-24", "2013-11-14"],"id":["001", "002", "003", "004"],"quantity":[22,8,7,10],"color":["Yellow", "Orange", "Red", "Yellow"],"transaction":["added", "added", "added", "added"]})

test_eq(df_log, logged_df)
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
df_log = log_delta(df_log=df_log, df_old=df_old, df_new=df_new, unique_id="id")
df_log
date id quantity color transaction
0 2020-11-24 001 22.0 Yellow added
1 2020-11-24 002 8.0 Orange added
2 2020-11-24 003 7.0 Red added
3 2020-11-24 004 10.0 Yellow added
4 2020-11-25 002 6.0 Orange modified
5 2020-11-24 004 5.0 Red modified
6 2020-11-25 001 22.0 Yellow modified
7 2020-11-24 005 10.0 Pink added
8 2020-11-24 003 7.0 Red removed
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
df_log = log_delta(df_log=df_log, df_old=df_old, df_new=df_new, unique_id="id", sort_by=["date"])
df_log
date id quantity color transaction
0 2020-11-24 001 22.0 Yellow added
1 2020-11-24 002 8.0 Orange added
2 2020-11-24 003 7.0 Red added
3 2020-11-24 004 10.0 Yellow added
5 2020-11-24 004 5.0 Red modified
7 2020-11-24 005 10.0 Pink added
8 2020-11-24 005 10.0 Pink added
9 2020-11-24 003 7.0 Red removed
4 2020-11-25 002 6.0 Orange modified
6 2020-11-25 001 22.0 Yellow modified
{% endraw %}
